long_description: Stable like a traditional kite, this single-line Prism Designs Triad is a triangular box kite dances that in the air with a soft tug of the line. Ripstop nylon sails are light yet tough for long-lasting performance; 16 in. wingspan. Rugged fiberglass frame is light and compact to carry yet durable enough to withstand a hard landing. Pieces pack up for travel into a compact sleeve with snap closure; packed size is 3 x 18 in. Set includes: kite, 100 ft. of line, carry sleeve and complete instructions. Closeout.
short_description: Stable like a traditional kite, this single-line Prism Designs Triad is a triangular box kite dances that in the air with a soft tug of the line.
